mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password, nickname, phone, birth, gender, profile_image, tier, created_date, last_modified_date) VALUES (#{user.username}, #{user.password}, #{user.nickname}, #{user.phone}, #{user.birth}, #{user.gender}, #{user.profileImage}, #{user.tier}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT users.*, IFNULL(follower_counts.follower_count, 0) AS followers, IFNULL(following_counts.following_count, 0) AS followings FROM users LEFT JOIN (SELECT following_id, COUNT(*) AS follower_count FROM follow GROUP BY following_id) AS follower_counts ON users.id = follower_counts.following_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT follower_id, COUNT(*) AS following_count FROM follow GROUP BY follower_id) AS following_counts ON users.id = following_counts.follower_id WHERE users.id = #{id};
